name: Vierfire
tag_list: two-factor-authentication, innovation, security, encryption, storage, seemless
overview:
We are a team of entrepreneurs and software developers who have worked together over several years.

We decided to simplify authentication by harnessing the power of our existing smart technology to help make our online and offline lives easier yet more secure in an ever more complex world.

We developed an all new Two Factor Authentication process, and currently this can be seen working with our products MySmartKey and SmartSafe Vault.

We are dedicated to developing intuitive, yet highly secure solutions to help everyone. We’re looking for more opportunities where we can use our new authentication method, whether it be for Cloud Storage or simply website login through to banking and financial services.
